name: Grandma's Cottage
description:
Submission for GGJ23.

You inherited your grandmother's cottage and decide to visit there. Something odd happens and you find yourself trapped in the house. To get out of there, you have to learn more about your family, your roots.

Team:

Ida - Programming & Design

Heta - Programming & Writing

Jenna - Design & 3D Art

Jesse - UI Programmer

Sari - 3D Art

Teemu - 3D Art
